patthana3.3:1.1.pli: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:3.1.pli: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:4.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:5.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.3:6.1.pli: Sappaccayo kusalo dhammo sappaccayassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:7.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:8.1.pli: Sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:9.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:10.1.pli: Sappaccayaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:11.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:12.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ. (Sabbattha ekaṃ, saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:13.1.pli: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:14.1.pli: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:15.1.pli: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:16.1.pli: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:17.1.pli: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:18.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, anantare ekaṃ …pe… nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:19.1.pli: Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:20.1.pli: Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:25.1.pli: Saṅkhataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sappaccayasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.3:27.1.pli: Anidassanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:28.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:29.1.pli: Anidassanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:30.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:31.1.pli: Anidassanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:32.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:33.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:34.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.3:35.1.pli: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.3:36.1.pli: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:37.1.pli: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:38.1.pli: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati.

patthana3.3:39.1.pli: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Anidassano abyākato dhammo sanidassanassa abyākatassa ca anidassanassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—sahajātādhipati.

patthana3.3:40.1.pli: Sanidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—pakatūpanissayo.

patthana3.3:41.1.pli: Anidassano abyākato dhammo anidassanassa abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:42.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi) sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:44.1.pli: Appaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:45.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vippayutte ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:47.1.pli: Appaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:48.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ (pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:49.1.pli: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato ca appaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … nava.

patthana3.3:50.1.pli: Appaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:51.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:52.1.pli: Sappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:53.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava …pe… novigate nava. (Sabbattha nava, saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:54.1.pli: Appaṭigho abyākato dhammo appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:55.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.

patthana3.3:56.1.pli: Sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:60.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.3:62.1.pli: Arūpiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:63.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:64.1.pli: Arūpiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:65.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.3:66.1.pli: Rūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.3:67.1.pli: Arūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.3:68.1.pli: Rūpiṃ abyākatañca arūpiṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.3:69.1.pli: Rūpiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:70.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:71.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… napurejāte nava …pe… nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ.)

patthana3.3:72.1.pli: Arūpī abyākato dhammo arūpissa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:73.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:77.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.3:79.1.pli: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.3:80.1.pli: Lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.3:81.1.pli: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana3.3:82.1.pli: Lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:83.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… kamme dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)

patthana3.3:84.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:85.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.3:86.1.pli: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:87.1.pli: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:88.1.pli: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:89.1.pli: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:90.1.pli: Lokiyo kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana3.3:91.1.pli: Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokuttarassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—sahajātādhipati. Lokuttaro kusalo dhammo lokiyassa kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:92.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve, kamme dve, āhāre dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:93.1.pli: Lokiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:94.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ, sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha sadisā.)

patthana3.3:95.1.pli: Lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.3:96.1.pli: Lokuttaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.3:97.1.pli: Lokiyaṃ abyākatañca lokuttaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:98.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)

patthana3.3:99.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve …pe… napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca …pe… nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, naāhāre ekaṃ …pe… namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ.)

patthana3.3:100.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.3:101.1.pli: Lokiyo abyākato dhammo lokiyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.3:102.1.pli: Lokuttaro abyākato dhammo lokuttarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:103.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:104.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.3:106.1.pli: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo ca kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:107.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:108.1.pli: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:109.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:110.1.pli: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.3:111.1.pli: Kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo kenaci viññeyyassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:112.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava …pe… kamme nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.3:116.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ akusalampi kenaci viññeyyaṃ abyākatampi kenaci viññeyyakusalasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
